titleStmt.title: Rhemes against Rome: or, The remoouing of the gagg of the new Gospell, and rightly placing it in the mouthes of the Romists, by the Rhemists in their English translation of the Scriptures. Which counter-gagg is heere fitted by the industrious hand of Richard Bernard ...
titleStmt.author: Bernard, Richard, 1568-1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kingston, for Ed. Blackmore, and are to be sold at his shop at the great south doore of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Heigham, John or Roger. The gagge of the new Gospel.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the great south doore of Pauls
